createuserguid, createtime, updateuserguid, updatetime,
ismain, iscalculated, isinvalid, iterationid, instancestatusbackup, instancelifcpbackup, classguid ) values (#PROCRTGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #INSTANCEGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #INSTANCETYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#,
#ISMAIN:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISCALCULATED:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISINVALID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ITERATIONID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #INSTANCESTATUSBACKUP:VARCHAR:NULL#, #INSTANCELIFCPBACKUP:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CLASSGUID# )
mapper.select: select distinct m.*, n.md_id id$$, n.md_name name$$, n.revisionid revisionid$$, n.iterationid iterationid$$, n.owneruser OWNERUSER, n.classguid classguid$$, n.CLASSIFICATION CLASSIFICATION$$, n.createtime createtime$$, n.updatetime updatetime$$, n.FILEGUID FILEGUID$$, n.FILENAME FILENAME$$, n.FILETYPE FILETYPE$$, n.status STATUS$$, n.LIFECYCLEPHASE LIFECYCLEPHASE$$, case when t.guid is null then 'N' else 'Y' end hascomment, m.invalidreasons, m.instancestatusbackup, m.instancelifcpbackup from wf_freshattach m inner join $tablename$ n on m.instanceguid = n.guid left join wf_trackattach t on t.attachguid = n.guid and t.procrtguid = #PROCRTGUID# where m.PROCRTGUID = #PROCRTGUID# and n.classguid = #CLASSGUID#
select a.* from wf_freshattach a where a.PROCRTGUID = #PROCRTGUID# and a.INSTANCEGUID = #INSTANCEGUID#
select distinct a.CLASSGUID from wf_freshattach a where a.procrtguid = #PROCRTGUID#

select distinct m.*, n.md_id id$$, n.md_name name$$, n.revisionid revisionid$$, n.iterationid iterationid$$, n.owneruser OWNERUSER, n.classguid, n.CLASSIFICATION CLASSIFICATION$$, n.createtime createtime$$, n.updatetime updatetime$$, n.FILEGUID FILEGUID$$, n.FILENAME FILENAME$$, n.FILETYPE FILETYPE$$, n.status STATUS$$, n.LIFECYCLEPHASE LIFECYCLEPHASE$$, (case when t.guid is null then 'N' else 'Y' end ) hascomment, m.invalidreasons, m.instancestatusbackup, m.instancelifcpbackup from wf_freshattach m inner join $tablename$ n on m.instanceguid = n.guid left join wf_trackattach t on (t.attachguid = n.guid and t.procrtguid = m.PROCRTGUID) where m.PROCRTGUID = #PROCRTGUID#
